title: How to Make Applesauce Chocolate Chip Cookies

steps.headline: Put in a medium bowl sugar, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg, and cloves.
Use a large bowl and combine applesauce and soda, mix well.
Add the dry ingredients in the medium bowl and mix thoroughly.
Add in the shortening and make sure to beat well.
steps.description: Mix in the eggs and vanilla; continue to beat well until eggs and vanilla blend with ingredients.

steps.headline: Add the flour slowly mixing well, add the chocolate chips.
Drop by teaspoonfuls on a greased cookie sheet.
Bake for 11-12 minutes, place unto cool rack for 5 min.

text: Preheat your oven to 375°F.  Put in a medium bowl sugar, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg, and cloves. Mix ingredients and set aside. Use a large bowl and combine applesauce and soda, mix well.  Add the dry ingredients in the medium bowl and mix thoroughly.  Add in the shortening and make sure to beat well. Mix in the eggs and vanilla; continue to beat well until eggs and vanilla blend with ingredients. Add the flour slowly mixing well, add the chocolate chips.  Drop by teaspoonfuls on a greased cookie sheet.  Bake for 11-12 minutes, place unto cool rack for 5 min.  Eat and enjoy.
